org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.algorithm

Interface RecommenderInstance


  • public interface RecommenderInstance
    A trained recommender instance for testing. The recommender has been trained, and a new recommender is opened. If the test data needs to be pre-supplied, it has been. This class is only used for evaluations.

    • Method Summary

      Methods
